extendedInfo.description: This wallpaper simulates a gentle drift through deep ocean currents. GPU effects are used to simulate hundreds of motes drifting through the ocean, shown through a fish eye lens.* Works well on any size screen (including tablets).* Completely proceedural (tiny memory footprint).* Highly optimised CPU native and GPU code.* Thoroughly tested.Please note that this is a live wallpaper, not an app.To activate it:* go to your home screen (press home button)* long press (press and hold) a blank area of the screen* select 'Wallpapers'* select 'Live Wallpapers'* select 'Deep Sea Drift'

reviews.title: Great wallpaper
reviews.comment: Only thing keeping me from choosing 5 stars is lack of customization
reviews.author: A Google User
